pullrequest.title: Change emissive color to set green vehicle back to green

content.raw: The demo description says `This demo has 2 vehicles: a green one without a battery, and blue one with a battery.` so this PR is simply correcting the emissive lighting which was blue for the green vehicle.
content.html: The demo description says This demo has 2 vehicles: a green one without a battery, and blue one with a battery. so this PR is simply correcting the emissive lighting which was blue for the green vehicle.
